clues.text: The smallest bird native to the U.S. is the calliope species of this bird, which reaches a length of about 3 inches

rounds.text: Of Advertising Age's Top 10 Advertising Icons of the 20th Century, one of the 3 that are animals
rounds.response: Elsie the Cow, the Energizer Bunny or Tony the Tiger
